Text: Someone's left the light on| no one should be staying back since we're set to release tomorrow.

Speaker: You
Text: Olivia? What are you staying back for?

Speaker: Olivia
Text: I found something… a critical flaw in the software.  Releasing it as is could result in severe complications.

Speaker: You
Text: What kind of flaw? Surely it would have been noticed earlier if it was this large of an problem.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: It's in the security module. Under very specific conditions the system could expose sensitive user data.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: It's rare but if it happens… it would be catastrophic.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: Bad enough that if it got out| it might seriously hurt our reputation.

Speaker: You
Text: How long do you think it would take to fix?

Speaker: Olivia
Text: At least a week| maybe two. It would absolutely mean missing the deadline.

Speaker: You
Text: This is tough| the client's been pushing hard for this release. We have a lot riding on meeting the deadline.
